alert.note: Alert for Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 7:58PM EDT until May 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of West Central Ohio, including the following county, Preble. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 758 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Eaton, Lewisburg, New Paris, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester, Interstate 70 at US Route 127, New Hope, Oklahoma and West Florence.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
